name: Halloween 2 - Asylum
description:
Dani is the cook at Haddonfield Psychiatric Hospital, where Michael Myers has been locked up for the last 30 years. This rainy Halloween night things may get out of control and Dani ends up fighting for his life.

Dani es el cocinero del Hospital Psiquiátrico de Haddonfield, donde está encerrado Michael Myers desde hace 30 años. Esta noche lluviosa de Halloween quizá las cosas se salgan de control y Dani termine luchando por su vida.
